events.title: Christopher Columbus Returns to Spain
events.description: Christopher Columbus returns to Spain from his first voyage to the Americas, bringing news of his discoveries.
events.significance: This event marked the beginning of European awareness and subsequent colonization of the Americas.

events.title: Launch of Sputnik 2 with Laika
events.description: The Soviet Union launched Sputnik 2, carrying Laika, the first living creature to orbit Earth.
events.significance: It was a milestone in space exploration and the first time a living being was sent into orbit, paving the way for human spaceflight.

events.title: Bill Clinton Elected President of the United States
events.description: Bill Clinton was elected as the 42nd President of the United States, defeating incumbent George H.W. Bush.
events.significance: His election represented a shift in U.S. politics and policy in the 1990s.

events.title: Discovery of Machu Picchu
events.description: American historian and explorer Hiram Bingham rediscovered Machu Picchu, the ancient Incan city in Peru.
events.significance: This discovery brought global attention to Incan culture and is considered a significant archaeological find.
